original_text: Nobody must go near them. You must throw stones at them to kill them. Or you must shoot arrows at them. You must not let them live, whether they are people or animals.” The people must wait until they hear the sound of a trumpet. When they hear a long noise, then they may go up on the mountain.’
korean_text: 그런 자에게는 손을 대지 말고 돌로 쳐죽이거나 화살로 쏘아 죽여야 하리니 짐승이나 사람을 막론하고 살아남지 못하리라 하고 나팔을 길게 불거든 산 앞에 이를 것이니라 하라

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들에게 가까이 가면 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: You must throw stones at them
Or you must shoot arrows at them.
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 당신은 그들에게 화살을 쏘아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You must not let them live
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 살도록 내버려 두면 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: whether they are people or animals.
until they hear the sound of a trumpet.
When they hear a long noise,
then they may go up on the mountain.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 산에 올라갈 수 있습니다.
